mapper.insert: insert into category_property (category_id, name, status, weight, create_time, creator, last_update_time, updater) values (#{categoryId}, #{name}, #{status}, #{weight}, #{createTime}, #{creator}, #{lastUpdateTime}, #{updater})
mapper.select: select id, category_id, name, status, weight, create_time, creator, last_update_time, updater from category_property where id = #{id}
select id, category_id, name, status, weight, create_time, creator, last_update_time, updater from category_property order by category_id, weight desc
select id, category_id, name, status, weight, create_time, creator, last_update_time, updater from category_property where status = #{status} order by category_id, weight desc
select id, category_id, name, status, weight, create_time, creator, last_update_time, updater from category_property where category_id = #{categoryId} and status = #{status} order by weight desc
select id, category_id, name, status, weight, create_time, creator, last_update_time, updater from category_property order by category_id, weight desc LIMIT #{begin},#{end}
mapper.update: update category_property set category_id = #{categoryId}, name = #{name}, status = #{status}, weight = #{weight}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime}, updater = #{updater} where id = #{id}
